mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(W.NOTI_DT, '%Y%m%d%H'), '0000') AS NOTI_DT , CONVERT(D.NUM_VAL4, INT) AS SKY_COND , CONVERT(W.TEMPC * 10, INT) AS TEMPC , IF(W.TEMP_MINI = -999.0, CONVERT(W.TEMP_MINI, INT), CONVERT(W.TEMP_MINI * 10, INT)) AS TEMP_MINI , IF(W.TEMP_HIGH = -999.0, CONVERT(W.TEMP_HIGH, INT), CONVERT(W.TEMP_HIGH * 10, INT)) AS TEMP_HIGH , CONVERT(W.HUMI, INT) AS HUMI , CONVERT(W.RAIN_PRO, INT) AS RAIN_PRO , CONVERT(W.RAINFALL * 10, INT) AS RAINFALL FROM BM_WEAT_INFO W LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO D ON W.SKY_COND = D.DL_CD AND D.CO_CD = 'SKY_COND' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTI_DT DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT LEFT(CONCAT('[', PROV_NM, ']', NEWS_TITLE), 50) AS CONTENT FROM BM_NEWS WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(MEAS_DT, '%Y%m%d%H'), '0000') AS MEAS_DT , DUSTC , SDUSTC , SDC , CMC , OZONEC , NDC FROM BM_ATMO_INFO ORDER BY MEAS_DT DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT L.MNG_ID , L.RSV_ID FROM BM_UPD_LOG L INNER JOIN BM_UPD_RSV U ON L.RSV_ID = U.RSV_ID AND U.RSV_DATE <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE L.MNG_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{MNG_ID}, '%') AND L.COMPLETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT R.RSV_ID , R.MNG_ID FROM BM_DESTI_RSV_RST R INNER JOIN BM_DESTI_RSV D ON R.RSV_ID = D.RSV_ID AND D.RSV_DATE <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE R.MNG_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{MNG_ID}, '%') AND R.COMPLETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT R.RSV_ID , R.MNG_ID , V.ROUT_ID FROM BM_VOC_RSV_RST R INNER JOIN BM_VOC_RSV V ON R.RSV_ID = V.RSV_ID AND V.RSV_DATE <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE R.MNG_ID = #{MNG_ID} AND R.COMPLETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY R.RSV_ID

SELECT R.RSV_ID , R.MNG_ID FROM BM_VDO_RSV_RST R INNER JOIN BM_VDO_RSV V ON R.RSV_ID = V.RSV_ID AND V.RSV_DATE <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE R.MNG_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{MNG_ID}, '%') AND R.COMPLETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT R.RSV_ID , R.MNG_ID FROM BM_SCR_RSV_RST R INNER JOIN BM_SCR_RSV S ON R.RSV_ID = S.RSV_ID AND S.RSV_DATE <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE R.MNG_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{MNG_ID}, '%') AND R.COMPLETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT R.RSV_ID , R.MNG_ID FROM BM_ED_RSV_RST R INNER JOIN BM_ED_RSV E ON R.RSV_ID = E.RSV_ID AND E.RSV_DATE <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE R.MNG_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{MNG_ID}, '%') AND R.COMPLETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT DL_CD_NM AS TABLE_NAME FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'CODE_TABLE' AND DL_CD = #{CODE}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(PUB_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AS PUB_DATE , ROUT_NM AS ROUT_ID , DIR_INFO AS ROUT_NM_KO , '' AS ROUT_NM_EN , IFNULL(LINE1_STR, '') AS LINE1_STR , IFNULL(LINE2_STR, '') AS LINE2_STR , IFNULL(LINE1_SATSTR, '') AS LINE1_SATSTR , IFNULL(LINE2_SATSTR, '') AS LINE2_SATSTR , IFNULL(LINE1_SUNSTR, '') AS LINE1_SUNSTR , IFNULL(LINE2_SUNSTR, '') AS LINE2_SUNSTR FROM BM_ROUT_INFO R LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC ON R.WAY_DIV = DC.TXT_VAL1 AND DC.CO_CD = 'UPDOWN_FLAG' WHERE ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID}
